delete.description:
Deletes RTE configuration by id

__Security Roles Allowed:__ ORGANISATION_MANAGE_EDITOR_CONFIGURATIONS

get.description: Gets RTE toolbar/styles configuration by configuration id

Gets RTE configuration by id with styles and colors pre-loaded

__SeeAlso:__ #getEditorConfigurationSummary(Integer, boolean)

delete.description:
Replaced by DocumentResource#delete(String)

Deletes instance by its id. __Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

409.description: Instance is used by other entities

post.description:
Validates instance by id and arguments.
By default, small validation is done, unless ValidateInstance.Parameters#CUSTOM_TYPE is specified, then a comprehensive is done. __Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

Gets instance boxes which have a new version of the asset by instance id

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

200.description: the result all instance boxes with new version of the asset

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

requestBody.description: list of instance boxes ids and selected version of the asset

204.description: the result all instance boxes with new version of the asset

get.description:
Gets all boxes for a template

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

403.description: The user has no rights to access the template and its boxes

get.description: __Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

post.description:
Creates an instance based on a specific template. If the instance is created successfully, link to
Document Wizard is stored in the HTTP header "Location".

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_INSTANCE

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the template, which will be used for the creation of the instance

get.description:
Gets template preview

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

403.description: User has no rights

put.description:
Captures HTML template preview and updates template accordingly

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: Delay in ms, between the moment when the page is fully loaded and the snapshot, default is 200ms

403.description: User has no rights

post.description:
Captures HTML template preview

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: Delay in ms, between the moment when the page is fully loaded and the snapshot, default is 200ms

403.description: User has no rights

get.description:
Gets all selected renderers for a template

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

403.description: The user has no rights to access the template and its renderers

patch.description:
Bulk template archive. "Location" header provides the url for task progress

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_TEMPLATE

202.description: The request is accepted. You can check the progress at /wp/rest/templates/bulk/archive-tasks/<task-key>

post.description:
Bulk template deletion. The "Location" header provides the url for the progress of the task.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_DELETE_TEMPLATE

202.description: The request is accepted. The "Location" header provides the url for the progress of the task.

400.description: Wrong deletion arguments e.g wrong template key

patch.description:
Bulk template unarchive. "Location" header provides the url for task progress

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_TEMPLATE

202.description: The request is accepted. You can check the progress at /wp/rest/templates/bulk/archive-tasks/<task-key>

get.description:
Gets the statuses of all template archive tasks

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

200.description:
a collection of GenericTemplateArchiveBulkTaskDto containing the statuses of each template
archiving/unarchiving task

get.description:
Gets the status of a template archiving/unarchiving task by its key

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

Gets the statuses of all template deletion tasks

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

200.description:
a collection of GenericTemplateDeletionBulkTaskDto containing the statuses of each template
deletion task

get.description:
Gets the status of a template deletion task by its key

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

200.description: If finished, returns the result of the deletion task. Otherwise returns its current status.

404.description: The deletion task is not found.

500.description: The template cannot be deleted as an exception occurred

post.description:
Creates a template by selected usage type. Returns response. If the template is created successfully, link to
Template Wizard Step 1 is stored in the HTTP header "Location". If the creation fails, an error message is stored
in the response body.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_TEMPLATE

requestBody.description:
Contains the usage type of the template. If the selected usage type is equal to 0, an INDD template is
created. If the selected usage type is equal to 2, a HTML template is created.

201.description: Response with specified status and DTO.

delete.description:
Deletes templates by ids. The RESTful service, which is responsible for processing the async request, is stored
in the HTTP header "Location".

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_DELETE_TEMPLATE

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Set of Ids of the templates to be deleted

get.description:
Use com.brandmaker.mms.api.wp.rest.resources.search.templates.SearchTemplatesResource#search

Request: 

     {
          "asset":{
              "id": 744,
              "version": 0
          },
          "validityConstraint": 2,  com.brandmaker.mms.api.domain.wp.nomenclature.ValidityConstraint
          "statuses": [0, 1, 2, 3]  com.brandmaker.mms.api.domain.wp.nomenclature.TemplateStatuses
     }

Searches templates by asset, which is used as source media __Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

200.description: Returns the templates associated with the asset. If the asset is missing or no templates are found, an empty list is returned.

patch.description:
Rescan Templates

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_TEMPLATE

get.description: __Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MODULE_ACCESS

403.description: User has no rights to see the template

delete.description:
Deletes template by its id.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_DELETE_TEMPLATE

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the template to be deleted

parameters.name: dryRun
parameters.description: If true, return result of operation, without actual delete.

409.description: The template is used by other entities

patch.description:
Assigns html archive to an existing HTML templatBaseInstanceFactory.java:146e. Returns response. If the zip is assigned successfully to the
template, link to Template Wizard Step 1 is stored in the HTTP header "Location". If the assignment fails, an
error message is stored in the response body.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ PUBLICATION_MANIPULATE_TEMPLATE

204.description: Response with specified status and DTO.

get.description: Returns JSON, mapping of the entity type to a list of ids of Brand Template Builder entities (templates, instances, smart blocks, smart grids, product templates, product instances), using the supplied theme

200.description: The number of entities, using the theme

get.description: Returns the number of Brand Template Builder entities (templates, instances, smart blocks, smart grids, product templates, product instances), using the supplied theme

  "success" : true,
  "message" : "..."
}

dryRun.description: if true - just return the result of deletion, without executing it.

documentKeys.description: template keys of deleted templates (T-101, OT-102, T-56)

externalReferences.description:
External references are strict and weak. Strict external references are when template was used as a smart page
or smart layout in documents or in other modules. If template has strict external references, deletion is not
possible. Weak external references are when template is used in other templates (smart page). Template deletion
is allowed in case of weak external references.
